channel.title: FlareSoft #474
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/rqyxat.png[/img] [b]FlareSoft[/b][i]#474[/i] [i]Let's revolutionize RSPS[/i]
Whenever I head to a RSPS downloads section, all I can see is PI after PI after PI. I want to offer a [b]high quality[/b] server that [b][u]WILL[/u][/b] be finished. A full remake of RuneScape, August 27, 2007. Yes this is a [b]REAL[/b] 474 not some 317 loading 474 content shit.
The name used to be [b]InnovationX PRO[/b] but since I have left InnovationX I'm calling it [b]FlareSoft[/b].
The idea of this project is to bring back memories, and let people once again enjoy old RuneScape as it was - not half assed. Here brings [b]FlareSoft[/b][i]#474[/i].
[b]Support Content[/b] Wallpapers: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/wallpaper.jpg || http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/spacewallpaper.jpg || http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/bluestyle.jpg Avatar (Works for MSN too): http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/avatar.png Signature: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/signature.png
Features [code]- PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT FLAWLESS COMBAT - AMAZING BARRELCHEST MINIGAME :D - [near] Perfect Chaos Elemental - [near] Perfect KBD - [near] PERFECT GOD WARS BOSS ROOMS - [near] PERFECT CLIPPED NPC FOLLOWING - [near] Perfect DFS spec - [near] Perfect Giant Mole - Awesome Giant Sea Snake - AWESOME A MAGE'S REVENGE QUEST :D - Start of Dragon Slayer quest <.< - Daggonoth Kings - Fight Pits - Barrows - Warriors Guild - Clothing boothes - Canoes - Dragonfire shield - Server sided following - Item picking - Magic carpet - Cow milking - Sedidor - Shantay Pass - Sheep Sheer - Spade dig - Teletabs - Tutorial island - Gertudes cat - Dragon slayer - Like 15 special attacks - Dog shoo away - Improved agility - Firemaking - Prayer - Thieving - Improved woodcutting - Improved mining - Improved cannon - Cats - Sounds - Pest Control start - Wilderness Obelisks - Castle Wars start - Clan Chat - Cannons - Stronghold of security - Daggonoth cave - Awesome portal system[/code]
[b]Giant Mole[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r2vAG24n1mc
[b]A Mage's Revenge[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hD2COWzQHZo (Just Boss, Updated) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vl8boImj4E (Full quest, outdated, commentary)
[b]KBD[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WPofXf64Fk8 (Also includes updated Saradomin)
[b]God Wars[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O-E82bIG9Dk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLTDKufTqXs (Saradomin, outdated)
[b]Clipped NPC Following[/b] (Since many said I was faking) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMg77KqG5BY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMg77KqG5BY[/url] (Updated NPC grinding) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j0Olv5_Ob1I]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j0Olv5_Ob1I[/url]
[b]Combat Preview[/b] (Since many said I was faking when I said [b]FLAWLESS[/b] combat) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s82i2KjcJos]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s82i2KjcJos[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo[/url]
[b]Warrior's Guild[/b] (Early development) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SEqVbRz5vAg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SEqVbRz5vAg[/url]

But if it’s ‘dead,’ then I guess we’re all just wasting our time on here, are we not?

item.title: FlareSoft #474
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:141, topic:360879”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=457169.msg3397840#msg3397840 date=1289628879]

Incorrect Grammar wit Ghommal.

Should be along the lines of:
Ghommal Welcomes you to the Warriors Guild.

Warrior’s

Not implying ownership

*Warriors

Umm saying it without ownership is not correct. He is saying it as if it is the guild of the warriors, thus they all own it. Hence Warrior’s.

I was mistaken. Point proven good sir

Yea, we all make mistakes.

You didnt need to delete your post though.

Tried to retain a small amount of dignity before anyone noticed.
[/quote]
Lol’d
You said that you wanted to suck someone off in a tutorial haha.
What more dignity could be taken away?[/quote]

show post pl0x

Read full topic
